concept.title: Issues Running Beermat
concept.shortdesc: If you have any issues running beermat, refer to this

section.title: Running Beermat using Java 6
section.p: If using Java 6, to get beermat running, Eclipse Juno (4.2) is required

section.title: Running Beermat using Java 7
section.p: Eclipse Kepler is required, and the latest update of Java 7 is required (u40 or higher).

section.title: Problems opening Beermat
section.p: Beermat will still open an editor through encountering problems, the editor's first page will display the problem encountered, and the XML view will still be accessible if the SVG opened is valid. Opening an un-parsable SVG, opening a file type not understood by beermat, or having the incorrect Java/Eclipse combination will all trigger the error page to load instead of the graphical editor.
